name: CryptoDefender
description:
You are Satoshi Ninjamoto

Defend the precious cryptocurrencies in the center of the screen from the greedy  Central Bankers who want to steal it for themselves 

Click the Left Mouse Button to move Satoshi around the game screen to block the bankers from getting to the cryptocurrency. Hold down the Left Shift key while clicking around the screen to have Satoshi jump around the cryptocurrency.

You start the game with 21,000,000 Cryptos, but you will start losing them whenever a banker makes it inside the cryptocurrency logo in the center of the screen. When you've lost all your cryptos, you lose the game!

But if you can hold off the evil central bankers from taking all the Cryptos for 90 seconds, then you can advance to the next level.

Try to survive all 3 levels: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and LiteCoin. If you can defend all 3 cryptocurrencies from the Bankers, you win the game!

Tip: It's much easier to play the game when you expand to the full screen!
Tip: If you jump perfectly onto a Central Banker without touching their arms or legs, you can take them out of the game. There are 11 Central Bankers floating around each level, if you can take a few of them out it makes your job much easier!
